attributes.about: I really enjoy movies - mostly drama & scifi. I also really like sculpture and have tried my hand at it a few times. Would like to spend more time on it. Looking to find some awesome art and to be blown away by what people can create :D

Director of Engineering @ Patreon.
On your side. ❤️️

attributes.one_liner: We're just some people trying to help artists make money and migrate from PHP to PYTHON while supporting an existing user base and their daily transactions
attributes.summary:
In my small country school I was very popular and the top student. Easily the most beautiful corgi in my grade, possibly my entire school. Most certainly in my class. 


Since moving to a city I have encountered many challenges. The students at my school are much smarter, much faster, and can jump much much higher over the vault box. Indeed, it is my greatest shame. The vault box.


As you can see from this graphic, the vault box is an unjust physical education examination for a corgi. However, it is not in my nature to simply give up. I dream of setting the school record for highest vault jump and I will work very hard to achieve this dream.

With your help I hope to overcome my obstacles and achieve my dreams.

  1. Become the model student of my new school
  2. Achieve the highest jump over the vault box.
  3. Senpai notices me

In exchange you will receive many benefits:
  • Digest of corgi news curated from vine and other sources.
  • A corgi's perspective of world events on my twitter.
  • ...and much much more.



no nofollow https://www.patreon.com/peterhollens
yes nofollow https://www.youtube.com/user/peterhollens

attributes.description: Get senpai to notice me...
Two senpais.

I will be able to hire a coach to help my overcome the highly unjust vault box. This coach will have a special focus on helping vertically challenged dogs jump very remarkable heights. Sometimes olympic heights.

I will compose a play on words, on the topic of your choice, punce per month.

attributes.description:
I will complement four people of your choice! I'll work with you to craft the most stunning complement for a friend, coworker, lover, or stranger, and then deliver said complement; or, leave it to me!


Includes
  • Patron-only content feed
attributes.title: Complimentary!

attributes.description: If someone pledges at this level, I'll add a four dollar pledge level!
I'll fix the bug of your choice... or at least look into it! You can exercise this once per month.
Let's go out for dinner! My treat (up to $20).
I will write a poem for every employee of patreon.

I will bring baked goods into the office! Mmmm. In the past, I have brought in baked goods from such exotic locales as Oakland's Donut Savant, a highly-acclaimed and highly delicious establishment; Pinkie's Bakery, known for its proximity to the office AS WELL AS its occasional gluten-free items; and the esteemed Berkeley institution, the Cheese Board Collective.

~Shout out! OW OW!
